es.ull.isaatc.util
Class WeeklyPeriodicCycle

java.lang.Object
  es.ull.isaatc.util.Cycle
      es.ull.isaatc.util.PeriodicCycle
          es.ull.isaatc.util.WeeklyPeriodicCycle

public class WeeklyPeriodicCycle
extends PeriodicCycle

A week-based periodic cycle which allows a user to define events happening some days a week.

Author:
Iván Castilla Rodríguez
